text_block_list.text:
My thoughts lingered with Hishi Amazon after 
I happened upon her at the pool. Her strength 
of spirit had made quite an impression on me.

Wondering how that would affect the way she ran, 
I decided to come take a look at her training ——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Awesome, you're getting the hang of it!! 
But you can still do better!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You told me you have a rival you really 
want to beat last time, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: So lemme see your fire burn!!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am!! I'll do my best!!
Hishi Amazon was helping out one of her juniors with training.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Alright, one more go!! Come on!!

Seeing her run on the track, I noticed her footwork 
was emphatic and powerful.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hup, hup, hup, hup, huuuuaaaaaahhh!!

Although her racecraft was a bit rough, she relied 
on her sheer power to snatch the lead.

Something about the way her bold running style 
reflected her personality drew me in……

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Thanks so much, Amazon, ma'am!! 
I'd be grateful for your help again sometime!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Sure thing!! But you gotta be knackered now. 
Why don't you go grab a good meal first, and then 
have a nice, relaxing soak in the bath.

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am!! I'll see you later then!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And don't trip, will ya!! ……Hehehh, she's looking 
a lot stauncher than before.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Might not be too long before she'll be a real 
force to be reckoned with on the track…!
choice_data_list: You sound pretty happy about that.
You sound pretty happy about that.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? Who the… hm? Ooh. Take it you're a trainer here, judging from the badge?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Sound happy? Nah, I am happy. It's great to see the younger kids getting stronger all the time!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
'Cause it also means I'll have that many more worthwhile 
opponents to have a one-v-one with, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Wooooooh! That's exactly why Tracen's such a great place! 
There's never any lack of kids with incredible ability, even by 
horsegirl standards!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
By having all out matches with them, I can keep growing 
stronger too! Same thing for the Twinkle Series!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: That's my way of life!!

It did seem that way. Almost every day, Hishi Amazon spent 
most of her time challenging horsegirls around campus……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Fuji, fight me!! Let's see who can hold 
their breath the longest underwater!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hmmmm, that sounds a little dangerous…… 
Tell you what, why don't we allow making each other laugh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you little rascal… but I'll take it! 
I don't back down from any fight!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Gahrhgehheh…!! Haah, haaah…… Dangit, Fuji! You didn't say anything about tickling!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaha!! Your armpits have always been your weak spot～

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hmmn……? Hang on, Biko, can you say that again…?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
… A Hero Pose Battle! Let's have one, Miss Amazon! 
We battle for who can be most like a Hero of Justice!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
………… I don't really get it, but if it's 
a one-on-one you want, you got it!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: How's this!? Hoh! Huoo! Haaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whew…… huh, you again?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Well, the Selection Race is coming up! My debut's on the line so I got no time to be taking it easy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I need to show the trainers there my best side 
and snag myself one with searing hot soul!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I told ya before, didn't I? I wanna face off with those 
in the Twinkle Series, not just the kids at Tracen!
choice_data_list: You really like having them battles, huh?
You really like having them battles, huh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! Well of course, being at an academy 
like this should make that clear!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: And also… I guess I got it from mom.
choice_data_list: Your mom ran in races too?
Your mom ran in races too?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, though it was overseas. I'm actually what you'd call 
one of those "third culture" kids. Neat, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
She made quite a few waves over there, you know? 
Of course I'd admire her and grow an interest in racing.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
The first time I got to really experience those races 
for myself was when I went to watch the Twinkle Series 
after returning to Japan……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I still remember my excitement clearly!! 
These insanely fast runners were battling it out…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I was screaming things like "amazing!", "unreal!", 
"I wanna join too!", "I wanna fight strong people!", 
and jumped out of the stands!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ahahah, 'course mom quickly dragged me 
back to my seat by the scruff of the neck!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Aah～ She was really furious about that…… 
I think I'd rather not remember that part.

…… In any case, it sounds like the emotions, excitement, 
and desire to race she felt back then were the starting point 
for Hishi Amazon.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh? What's up? You starting to fall for me or something?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Too bad for you! I'm not accepting any trainers 
until after the Selection Race!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Not that there are any rules about that, but that's 
what I've decided. I want you trainers to have a good 
close look at me in the race.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Well, just look forward to it!

Just what sort of race would the always–overflowing–with–spirit 
Hishi Amazon run? I was definitely starting to get excited……
